wikitext.*:
'''''gorthob''''' is a [[Sindarin]] word meaning "horrible".<ref name=AC>{{WJ|AC}}, p. 415 (Author's note 28)</ref> It has been suggested that the form should be ''gortheb'' (applying standard adjectival ending).<ref>[http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/online/sindar/dict-sd-en-strict.html Hiswelókë's Sindarin Dictionary] (accessed 28 December 2010)</ref>

==Etymology==
*[[Sundocarme|Root]] [[NGUR]]<ref name=AC/>

==Other versions of the legendarium==
In the [[The Etymologies|Etymologies]] appears the [[Doriathrin]] form ''ngorthin'' ("horrible").<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 377 (root ÑGOROTH)</ref>

==See also==
*Sindarin ''[[gorth]]''
*Sindarin ''[[gorgor]]''
